column7: Basic pathophysiological changes associated with major organ system failure and appropriate nutritional support and treatment. Provides medical orientation needed for participating in medical nutritional rounds. Same as FSHN 520. 2 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated in the same term up to 4 hours and separate terms up to 8 hours. Prerequisite: Upper division course in physiology and a course in clinical nutrition.
